verses.name: Job 32:5
verses.text: When Elihu saw that there was no answer in the mouth of these three men, then his wrath was kindled.

verses.name: Job 32:6
verses.text: And Elihu the son of Barachel the Buzite answered and said, I am young, and ye are very old; wherefore I was afraid, and durst not shew you mine opinion.

verses.name: Job 32:7
verses.text: I said, Days should speak, and multitude of years should teach wisdom.

verses.name: Job 32:8
verses.text: But there is a spirit in man: and the inspiration of the Almighty giveth them understanding.

verses.name: Job 32:9
verses.text: Great men are not always wise: neither do the aged understand judgment.
